gateway

Class GatewayHeartbeatThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gateway.GatewayHeartbeatThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GatewayHeartbeatThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class GatewayHearbeatThread is a extends Threads class. Each instance of this class is used to send and receive heart beats to and from a single EC2 instance. The thread first sends a packet, if send is successful, it sleeps for a specified a period and listens to receive a response. Once it receives a response, it immediately sends another heartbeat. While it's listening, there is a arbitrary timer which in case it runs out, it means that no heart beat is detected and therefore the server is down. In this case it updates the state of the monitored instance from "ON" to "DOWN".

    Author:
    Bahman

                      int heartbeatFailInterval,
                      long heartbeatTransmitTimer)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Public class constructor for the Thread

        Parameters:
        name - - Name assigned to the instance
        address - - Private DNS address of the instance
        serverSendPort - - Port number that heartbeat is being sent from
        instanceReceivePort - - Port number that on the instance open to listening for a heartbeat
        heartbeatFailInterval - - Response receive time-out interval
        heartbeatTransmitTimer - - Time interval between each heartbeat

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
